title: Noah's Ark (K)
creator_credit: Bill Justice and Walt Disney Productions
brief_description: An updated version of the story of Noah’s Ark, which will trigger children’s interest in biblical stories and initiate classroom discussion. The film is inventive in its use of three-dimensional animation techniques that would be of special interest to film study classes.
